dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT 'TSFEEXP/' || (CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) < 4 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - 1,'9999')),3,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE),'9999')),3,2) || '/' || j.job_xid ELSE SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE),'9999')),3,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(TRIM(TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) + 1,'9999')),3,2) || '/' || j.job_xid END) bill_no, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') system_date, invr.invoice_refnum_value job_no, 'TSFE' || j.job_xid bl_no, (SELECT iref.invoice_refnum_value FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%EXCHANGE RATE PER USD%' AND ROWNUM = 1) exchange_rate, (SELECT LISTAGG(iref.invoice_refnum_value,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY iref.invoice_refnum_value) FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%SHIPPING BILL NUMBER%') sb_no, inv.invoice_number inv_no, (SELECT DISTINCT s1.payment_method_code_gid FROM invoice inv1 INNER JOIN invoice_refnum invr1 ON inv1.invoice_gid = invr1.invoice_gid AND invr1.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBID' INNER JOIN job j1 ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || invr1.invoice_refnum_value = j1.job_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj1 ON j1.job_gid = jorj1.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.perspective = 'S' AND s1.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s1.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s1.is_primary = 'Y' WHERE inv1.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid) vol_freight, (SELECT iref.invoice_refnum_value FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%SHIPPING BILL DATE%' AND ROWNUM = 1) sb_date FROM invoice inv LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_refnum invr ON inv.invoice_gid = invr.invoice_gid AND invr.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBID' LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || invr.invoice_refnum_value = j.job_gid WHERE inv.invoice_gid = :INVOICE_ID

SELECT DISTINCT glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','3')) shipper_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER')) shipper_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER','FAX:') shipper_fax, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO') inv_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO','3')) inv_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO')) inv_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','BILL-TO','FAX:') inv_fax, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_country(s.port_of_load_location_gid) load_port, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province(s.port_of_dis_location_gid) discharge_port, (CASE WHEN cv.voyage_name IS NULL THEN v.vessel_name ELSE cv.voyage_name END) vessel_name FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN invoice_refnum invr ON inv.invoice_gid = invr.invoice_gid AND invr.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBID' INNER JOIN job j ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || invr.invoice_refnum_value = j.job_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid WHERE inv.invoice_gid = :INVOICE_ID

SELECT ROWNUM sr_no, a.description, TRIM(TO_CHAR(a.quantity,'999,999,990')) quantity, a.currency, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(a.item_rate,2),'999,999,990')) item_rate, (CASE WHEN a.in_rupees = 'INR' AND a.currency = 'USD' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(a.quantity * a.item_rate * TO_NUMBER(a.exchange_rate),2),'999,999,990.00')) ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(a.quantity * a.item_rate,2),'999,999,990.00')) END) total_amount FROM (SELECT ili.accessorial_description description, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ilir.reference_number FROM invoice_lineitem_refnum ilir WHERE ilir.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND ilir.lineitem_seq_no = ili.lineitem_seq_no AND ilir.invoice_li_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CHARGE APPLIED PER BL') = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM invoice invc INNER JOIN invoice_refnum invr ON invc.invoice_gid = invr.invoice_gid AND invr.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBID' INNER JOIN job j ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || invr.invoice_refnum_value = j.job_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE invc.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid) END) quantity, ili.freight_charge_gid currency, ili.freight_charge item_rate, (SELECT iref.invoice_refnum_value FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.INVOICE TOTAL AMOUNT CURRENCY') in_rupees, (SELECT iref.invoice_refnum_value FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%EXCHANGE RATE PER USD%' AND ROWNUM = 1) exchange_rate FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN invoice_lineitem ili ON inv.invoice_gid = ili.invoice_gid WHERE inv.invoice_gid = :INVOICE_ID) a

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(c.service_tax,2),'999,999,999,990.00')) service_tax, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(c.edu_cess_tax,2),'999,999,999,990.00')) edu_cess_tax, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(c.she_cess_tax,2),'999,999,999,990.00')) she_cess_tax, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(c.sub_total + c.service_tax + c.edu_cess_tax + c.she_cess_tax,2),'999,999,999,990.00')) grand_total, (CASE WHEN c.in_rupees = 'INR' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.num_to_word_india(c.sub_total + c.service_tax + c.edu_cess_tax + c.she_cess_tax) ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.num_to_word_dollars(c.sub_total + c.service_tax + c.edu_cess_tax + c.she_cess_tax) END) spelled_total FROM (SELECT SUM(b.tax_total_amount * 0.12) service_tax, (SUM(b.tax_total_amount * 0.12) * 0.02) edu_cess_tax, (SUM(b.tax_total_amount * 0.12) * 0.02) she_cess_tax, SUM(b.total_amount) sub_total, b.in_rupees FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN a.tax_yes_no = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN a.in_rupees = 'INR' AND a.currency = 'USD' THEN ROUND(a.quantity * a.item_rate * TO_NUMBER(a.exchange_rate),2) ELSE ROUND(a.quantity * a.item_rate,2) END) ELSE 0 END) tax_total_amount, (CASE WHEN a.in_rupees = 'INR' AND a.currency = 'USD' THEN ROUND(a.quantity * a.item_rate * TO_NUMBER(a.exchange_rate),2) ELSE ROUND(a.quantity * a.item_rate,2) END) total_amount, a.in_rupees FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN (SELECT ilir.reference_number FROM invoice_lineitem_refnum ilir WHERE ilir.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND ilir.lineitem_seq_no = ili.lineitem_seq_no AND ilir.invoice_li_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CHARGE APPLIED PER BL') = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM invoice invc INNER JOIN invoice_refnum invr ON invc.invoice_gid = invr.invoice_gid AND invr.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBID' INNER JOIN job j ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || invr.invoice_refnum_value = j.job_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE invc.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid) END) quantity, ili.freight_charge_gid currency, ili.freight_charge item_rate, (SELECT iref.invoice_refnum_value FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.INVOICE TOTAL AMOUNT CURRENCY') in_rupees, (SELECT iref.invoice_refnum_value FROM invoice_refnum iref WHERE iref.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND iref.invoice_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%EXCHANGE RATE PER USD%' AND ROWNUM = 1) exchange_rate, (SELECT ilir.reference_number FROM invoice_lineitem_refnum ilir WHERE ilir.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND ilir.lineitem_seq_no = ili.lineitem_seq_no AND ilir.invoice_li_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SERVICE TAX APPLICABLE') tax_yes_no FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN invoice_lineitem ili ON inv.invoice_gid = ili.invoice_gid WHERE inv.invoice_gid = :INVOICE_ID) a) b GROUP BY b.in_rupees) c

SELECT COUNT(ili.invoice_gid) + 1 st_sr_no, COUNT(ili.invoice_gid) + 2 ec_sr_no, COUNT(ili.invoice_gid) + 3 sc_sr_no FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN invoice_lineitem ili ON inv.invoice_gid = ili.invoice_gid WHERE inv.invoice_gid = :INVOICE_ID

SELECT 'on ' || (LISTAGG(b.sr_no,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY b.sr_no)) basis FROM (SELECT ROWNUM sr_no, a.applied FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN (SELECT ilir.reference_number FROM invoice_lineitem_refnum ilir WHERE ilir.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND ilir.lineitem_seq_no = ili.lineitem_seq_no AND ilir.invoice_li_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%SERVICE TAX APPLICABLE%') = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) applied FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN invoice_lineitem ili ON inv.invoice_gid = ili.invoice_gid WHERE inv.invoice_gid = :INVOICE_ID) a) b WHERE b.applied = 1
